info.title: PokeAPI Core (Independent Publisher)
info.description: All the Pokemon data you'll ever need in one place, easily accessible through a modern free open-source solution. Core contains the pokemon and evolution endpoints.

get.description: Abilities provide passive effects for Pokemon in battle or in the overworld. Pokemon have multiple possible abilities but can have only one ability at a time.

effect_changes.description: The list of previous effects this ability has had across version groups.
effect_changes.title: Effect changes

effect.description: The localized effect text for an API resource in a specific language.
effect.title: Effect

short_effect.description: The localized effect text in brief.
short_effect.title: Short effect

effect_entries.description: The effect of this ability listed in different languages.
effect_entries.title: Effect entries

flavor_text.description: The localized name for an API resource in a specific language.
flavor_text.title: Flavor text

flavor_text_entries.description: The flavor text of this ability listed in different languages.
flavor_text_entries.title: Flavor text entries

generation.description: The generation this ability originated in.
generation.title: Generation

is_main_series.description: Whether or not this ability originated in the main series of the video games.
is_main_series.title: Is main series

is_hidden.description: Whether or not this a hidden ability for the referenced Pokemon.
is_hidden.title: Is hidden

pokemon.description: The Pokemon this ability could belong to.
pokemon.title: Pokemon

slot.description: Pokemon have 3 ability 'slots' which hold references to possible abilities they could have. This is the slot of this ability for the referenced pokemon.
slot.title: Slot

pokemon.description: A list of Pokemon that could potentially have this ability.
pokemon.title: Pokemon

get.description: Abilities provide passive effects for Pokemon in battle or in the overworld. Pokemon have multiple possible abilities but can have only one ability at a time.
Characteristics indicate which stat contains a Pokemon's highest IV. A Pokemon's Characteristic is determined by the remainder of its highest IV divided by 5 (gene_modulo).

gene_modulo.description: The remainder of the highest stat/IV divided by 5.
gene_modulo.title: Gene_Modulo

highest_stat.description: The stat which results in this characteristic.
highest_stat.title: Highest stat

possible_values.description: The possible values of the highest stat that would result in a Pokemon receiving this characteristic when divided by 5.
possible_values.title: Possible values

get.description: Characteristics indicate which stat contains a Pokemon's highest IV. A Pokemon's Characteristic is determined by the remainder of its highest IV divided by 5 (gene_modulo).
Genders were introduced in Generation II for the purposes of breeding Pokemon but can also result in visual differences or even different evolutionary lines.
Growth rates are the speed with which Pokemon gain levels through experience.

pokemon_species.description: A Pokemon species that can be the referenced gender.
pokemon_species.title: Pokemon species

rate.description: The chance of this Pokemon being female, in eighths; or -1 for genderless.
rate.title: Rate

pokemon_species_details.description: A list of Pokemon species that can be this gender and how likely it is that they will be.
pokemon_species_details.title: Pokemon species details

required_for_evolution.description: A list of Pokemon species that required this gender in order for a Pokemon to evolve into them.
required_for_evolution.title: Required for evolution

get.description: Genders were introduced in Generation II for the purposes of breeding Pokemon but can also result in visual differences or even different evolutionary lines.

formula.description: The formula used to calculate the rate at which the Pokemon species gains level.
formula.title: Formula

experience.description: The amount of experience required to reach the referenced level.
experience.title: Experience

levels.description: A list of levels and the amount of experienced needed to atain them based on this growth rate.
levels.title: Levels

pokemon_species.description: A list of Pokemon species that gain levels at this growth rate.
pokemon_species.title: Pokemon species

get.description: Growth rates are the speed with which Pokemon gain levels through experience.

Pokemon are the creatures that inhabit the world of the Pokemon games. They can be caught using Pokeballs and trained by battling with other Pokemon. Each Pokemon belongs to a specific species but may take on a variant which makes it differ from other Pokemon of the same species, such as base stats, available abilities and typings.

abilities.description: A list of abilities this Pokemon could potentially have.
abilities.title: Abilities

base_experience.description: The base experience gained for defeating this Pokemon.
base_experience.title: Base experience

latest.description: The latest depiction of this Pokemon's cry.
latest.title: Latest

legacy.description: The legacy depiction of this Pokemon's cry.
legacy.title: Legacy

cries.description: A set of cries used to depict this Pokemon in the game.
cries.title: Cries

forms.description: A list of forms this Pokemon can take on.
forms.title: Forms

game_index.description: The internal id of an API resource within game data.
game_index.title: Game index

version.description: The version relevant to this game index.
version.title: Version

game_indices.description: A list of game indices relevant to Pokemon item by generation.
game_indices.title: Game indices

height.description: The height of this Pokemon in decimetres.
height.title: Height

held_items.description: A list of items this Pokemon may be holding when encountered.
held_items.title: Held items

is_default.description: Set for exactly one Pokemon used as the default for each species.
is_default.title: Is default

location_area_encounters.description: A link to a list of location areas, as well as encounter details pertaining to specific versions.
location_area_encounters.title: Location area encounters

move.description: The move the Pokemon can learn.
move.title: Move

level_learned_at.description: The minimum level to learn the move.
level_learned_at.title: Level learned at

move_learn_method.description: The method by which the move is learned.
move_learn_method.title: Move learn method

order.description: Order by which the pokemon will learn the move. A newly learnt move will replace the move with lowest order.
order.title: Order

version_group.description: The version group in which the move is learned.
version_group.title: Version group

version_group_details.description: The details of the version in which the Pokemon can learn the move.
version_group_details.title: Version group details

moves.description: A list of moves along with learn methods and level details pertaining to specific version groups.
moves.title: Moves

order.description: Order for sorting. Almost national order, except families are grouped together.
order.title: Order

abilities.description: The abilities the referenced pokemon had up to and including the listed generation. If null, the slot was previously empty.
abilities.title: Abilities

generation.description: The last generation in which the referenced pokemon had the listed abilities.
generation.title: Generation

past_abilities.description: A list of details showing abilities this pokemon had in previous generations.
past_abilities.title: Past abilities

past_types.description: A list of details showing types this pokemon had in previous generations
past_types.title: Past types

species.description: The species this Pokemon belongs to.
species.title: Species

back_default.description: The default depiction of this Pokemon from the back in battle.
back_default.title: Back default

back_female.description: The female depiction of this Pokemon from the back in battle.
back_female.title: Back female

back_shiny.description: The shiny depiction of this Pokemon from the back in battle.
back_shiny.title: Back shiny

back_shiny_female.description: The shiny female depiction of this Pokemon from the back in battle.
back_shiny_female.title: Back shiny female

front_default.description: The default depiction of this Pokemon from the front in battle.
front_default.title: Front default

front_female.description: The female depiction of this Pokemon from the front in battle.
front_female.title: Front female

front_shiny.description: The shiny depiction of this Pokemon from the front in battle.
front_shiny.title: Front shiny

front_shiny_female.description: The shiny female depiction of this Pokemon from the front in battle.
front_shiny_female.title: Front shiny female

sprites.description: A set of sprites used to depict this Pokemon in the game.
sprites.title: Sprites

base_stat.description: The base value of the stat.
base_stat.title: Base stat

effort.description: The effort points (EV) the Pokemon has in the stat.
effort.title: Effort

stats.description: A list of base stat values for this Pokemon.
stats.title: Stats

types.description: A list of details showing types this Pokemon has.
types.title: Types

weight.description: The weight of this Pokemon in hectograms.
weight.title: Weight

get.description: Pokemon are the creatures that inhabit the world of the Pokemon games. They can be caught using Pokeballs and trained by battling with other Pokemon. Each Pokemon belongs to a specific species but may take on a variant which makes it differ from other Pokemon of the same species, such as base stats, available abilities and typings.

Types are properties for Pokemon and their moves. Each type has three properties: which types of Pokemon it is super effective against, which types of Pokemon it is not very effective against, and which types of Pokemon it is completely ineffective against.

double_damage_from.description: A list of types that are very effective against this type.
double_damage_from.title: Double damage from

double_damage_to.description: A list of types this type is very effect against.
double_damage_to.title: Double damage to

half_damage_from.description: A list of types that are not very effective against this type.
half_damage_from.title: Half damage from

half_damage_to.description: A list of types this type is not very effect against.
half_damage_to.title: Half damage to

no_damage_from.description: A list of types that have no effect on this type.
no_damage_from.title: No damage from

no_damage_to.description: A list of types this type has no effect on.
no_damage_to.title: No damage to

damage_relations.description: A detail of how effective this type is toward others and vice versa.
damage_relations.title: Damage relations

game_index.description: The internal id of an API resource within game data.
game_index.title: Game index

generation.description: The generation relevent to this game index.
generation.title: Generation

game_indices.description: A list of game indices relevent to this item by generation.
game_indices.title: Game indices

generation.description: The generation this type was introduced in.
generation.title: Generation

move_damage_class.description: The class of damage inflicted by this type.
move_damage_class.title: Move damage class

moves.description: A list of moves that have this type.
moves.title: Moves

past_damage_relations.description: A list of details of how effective this type was toward others and vice versa in previous generations
past_damage_relations.title: Past damage relations

pokemon.description: The Pokemon that has the referenced type.
pokemon.title: Pokemon

slot.description: The order the Pokemon's types are listed in.
slot.title: Slot

pokemon.description: A list of details of Pokemon that have this type.
pokemon.title: Pokemon

get.description: Types are properties for Pokemon and their moves. Each type has three properties: which types of Pokemon it is super effective against, which types of Pokemon it is not very effective against, and which types of Pokemon it is completely ineffective against.

Evolution chains are essentially family trees. They start with the lowest stage within a family and detail evolution conditions for each as well as Pokemon they can evolve into up through the hierarchy.

baby_trigger_item.description: The item that a Pokemon would be holding when mating that would trigger the egg hatching a baby Pokemon rather than a basic Pokemon.
baby_trigger_item.title: Baby trigger item

get.description: Evolution chains are essentially family trees. They start with the lowest stage within a family and detail evolution conditions for each as well as Pokemon they can evolve into up through the hierarchy.
Evolution triggers are the events and conditions that cause a Pokemon to evolve.

pokemon_species.description: A list of pokemon species that result from this evolution trigger.
pokemon_species.title: Pokemon species

get.description: Evolution triggers are the events and conditions that cause a Pokemon to evolve.

count.description: The total number of resources available from this API.
count.title: Count

next.description: The URL for the next page in the list.
next.title: Next

previous.description: The URL for the previous page in the list.
previous.title: Previous

official.description: Whether or not the games are published in this language.
official.title: Is official

iso639.description: The two-letter code of the country where this language is spoken. Note that it is not unique.
iso639.title: ISO 639

iso3166.description: The two-letter code of the language. Note that it is not unique.
iso3166.title: ISO 3166

VersionGroupType.description: Version group details of this information.
VersionGroupType.title: Version group details

description.description: The descriptions of this characteristic in specific language.
description.title: Description

DescriptionType.description: The descriptions of this characteristic listed in different languages.
DescriptionType.title: Descriptions

is_baby.description: Whether or not this link is for a baby Pokemon. This would only ever be true on the base link.
is_baby.title: Is baby

species.description: The Pokemon species at this point in the evolution chain.
species.title: Species

evolution_details.description: All details regarding the specific details of the referenced Pokemon species evolution.
evolution_details.title: Evolution details

ChainLinkType.description: The base chain link object. Each link contains evolution details for a Pokemon in the chain. Each link references the next Pokemon in the natural evolution order.
ChainLinkType.title: Chain

NamesType.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.
NamesType.title: Names

ability.description: The ability the Pokemon may have.
ability.title: Ability

is_hidden.description: Whether or not this is a hidden ability.
is_hidden.title: Is hidden

slot.description: The slot this ability occupies in this Pokemon species.
slot.title: Slot

PokemonAbilityType.description: A list of abilities this Pokemon had or could potentially have.
PokemonAbilityType.title: Abilities

slot.description: The order the Pokemon's types are listed in.
slot.title: Slot

type.description: The type the referenced Pokemon has or had.
type.title: Type

idOrNameParam.name: id or name
idOrNameParam.description: Unique ID or Name of the resource.

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: Limit the results to be returned, default is 20.
